医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
从尿液中捕获和释放纳米线表面 cfDNA 的新技术由日本名古屋大学研究人员领导的一个小组开发了一种技术，可以从尿液中捕获并释放纳米线表面的游离 DNA (cfDNA)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/New-technology-to-capture-and-release-cfDNA-on-nanowire-surfaces-from-urine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/New-technology-to-capture-and-release-cfDNA-on-nanowire-surfaces-from-urine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07ac41f0-1b32-483b-be26-035ecbd1c90a Mon, 03 Jul 2023 01:11:06 -0400 New technology to capture and release cfDNA on nanowire surfaces from urine
新的 COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗作为异源加强疫苗是安全且具有高免疫原性的：研究由严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 引起的 COVID-19 大流行已导致全球确诊病例超过 6 亿例，死亡人数达 650 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/New-COVID-19-mRNA-vaccine-is-safe-and-highly-immunogenic-as-a-heterologous-booster-Study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/New-COVID-19-mRNA-vaccine-is-safe-and-highly-immunogenic-as-a-heterologous-booster-Study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d4c4108-8d6a-49e8-b16f-fad596b81d7c Mon, 03 Jul 2023 00:58:16 -0400 New COVID-19 mRNA vaccine is safe and highly immunogenic as a heterologous booster: Study
新的相关性改善了患者的管理和复苏后护理新发现的相关性可以改善管理并优化个别患者的复苏后护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Newly-find-correlation-could-improve-management-and-improve-post-resusitation-care-for-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Newly-find-correlation-could-improve-management-and-improve-post-resusitation-care-for-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=006d0be5-822c-4e4b-9746-853f668c3dfa Mon, 03 Jul 2023 00:35:00 -0400 New correlation improves management and post-resuscitation care for patients
使用人工智能可以在 CT 检查中对脾肿大进行大规模评估根据 ARRS 自己的美国伦琴学杂志 (AJR) 上发表的一份已接受的手稿，使用自动深度学习人工智能工具以及基于体重的体积阈值，可以对任何人进行的 CT 检查中的脾肿大进行大规模评估。指示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Using-AI-might-afford-large-scale-evaluation-for-splenomegaly-on-CT-examinations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Using-AI-might-afford-large-scale-evaluation-for-splenomegaly-on-CT-examinations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe1fd349-d1c5-45db-92bd-46b2b2378ca0 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 00:21:09 -0400 Using AI might afford large-scale evaluation for splenomegaly on CT examinations
维生素 D 缺乏会导致老年人炎症增加根据 C 反应蛋白 (CRP) 的测量，老年人缺乏维生素 D 与较高的炎症水平相关。优化维生素 D 水平可能会调节该人群的炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Vitamin-D-deficiency-contributes-to-increased-inflammation-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Vitamin-D-deficiency-contributes-to-increased-inflammation-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26f30e8c-cdcc-4351-b79c-ae1f6ab825d6 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 23:14:00 -0400 Vitamin D deficiency contributes to increased inflammation in older adults
酮饮食可以用来治疗偏头痛吗？生酮疗法等饮食干预措施有望降低头痛的频率和严重程度，为全世界的人们提供潜在的缓解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Can-the-keto-diet-be-used-to-treat-migraines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Can-the-keto-diet-be-used-to-treat-migraines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76f0524d-0be1-4ff7-8ce3-5d81b4672eb3 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 23:07:00 -0400 Can the keto diet be used to treat migraines?
DASH 饮食可降低尿酸水平研究人员评估了生酮饮食和 DASH 饮食对血清尿酸水平的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/DASH-diet-reduces-uric-acid-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/DASH-diet-reduces-uric-acid-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7659e4c6-905c-49e8-9be3-7a7f497fd53e Sun, 02 Jul 2023 22:57:00 -0400 DASH diet reduces uric acid levels
长时间工作和工作与生活平衡不佳威胁着新加坡年轻专业人士的健康年轻人的长时间工作阻碍了健康行为，影响了人口健康。了解这些障碍对于有针对性的健康促进工作至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Long-work-hours-and-poor-work-life-balance-threaten-health-of-Singapores-young-professionals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Long-work-hours-and-poor-work-life-balance-threaten-health-of-Singapores-young-professionals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7da689e2-a872-4790-8ae4-3835ef4347b1 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 22:47:00 -0400 Long work hours and poor work-life balance threaten health of Singapore's young professionals
研究发现夜间限速并不能有效减少电动滑板车伤害研究旨在调查夜间限速是否与电动滑板车相关伤害的发生率有关。结果表明，夜间限速与伤害发生率降低无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Study-finds-nighttime-speed-limits-not- effective-in-reducing-e-scooter-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/Study-finds-nighttime-speed-limits-not- effective-in-reducing-e-scooter-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8bdb5d8-57c0-4355-8142-98955a656823 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 22:37:00 -0400 Study finds nighttime speed limits not effective in reducing e-scooter injuries
COVID-19 的严重程度与抗凝血蛋白的自身抗体有关研究调查了 COVID-19 患者中 ADAMTS13 抗体的出现情况及其与疾病严重程度和 ADAMTS13 活性降低的关系。研究结果表明，需要将 ADAMTS13 抗体纳入诊断和管理 SARS-CoV-2 感染中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/COVID-19-severity-linked-to-autoantibodies-against-blood-clotting- Protein.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230702/COVID-19-severity-linked-to-autoantibodies-against-blood-clotting- Protein.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f966df22-663f-4a71-8f9d-9c1b20e29246 Sun, 02 Jul 2023 21:41:00 -0400 COVID-19 severity linked to autoantibodies against blood clotting protein
